QueryResult.text: SELECT N.ID, N.DEF_RULE_ID, N.OBJECT_ID, N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, N.NOTIFY_WHEN_CODE, N.CREATED_DATE, N.CREATED_BY, N.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, N.LAST_UPDATED_BY, R.FULL_NAME AS NAME, R.UNIQUE_NAME AS CODE, NULL AS LANGUAGE_CODE FROM ESC_DEF_NOTIFICATIONS N, SRM_RESOURCES R WHERE N.OBJECT_ID = R.USER_ID AND N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE = 'ESC_NOTIFY_USER' UNION SELECT N.ID, N.DEF_RULE_ID, N.OBJECT_ID, N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, N.NOTIFY_WHEN_CODE, N.CREATED_DATE, N.CREATED_BY, N.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, N.LAST_UPDATED_BY, G.GROUP_NAME AS NAME, G.GROUP_CODE AS CODE, G.LANGUAGE_CODE FROM ESC_DEF_NOTIFICATIONS N, CMN_SEC_GROUPS_V G WHERE N.OBJECT_ID = G.ID AND N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE = 'ESC_NOTIFY_GROUP'
